thumb.title: God of destruction / 初音ミク
thumb.description: God of destructionFind the strength to be reborn.生まれ変わる 強さをGod of destruction, grab it with your hands. The light of hope, the path to the future.破壊の神よ その手で掴め希望の光を 未来への道をEmbrace all the pain and sorrow. Find the strength to be reborn.痛みと悲しみ 全て抱きしめて生まれ変わる 強さをSmall pieces pile up and one day crumble towards the end of our destiny.小さな欠片 積み重ねられていつか崩れる 運命の先へThe buildings reflected on the swaying water have a cold, inorganic glow.揺れる水面 映すビル群は冷たくて 無機質な輝きI walk alone on a lonely night road. A sense of irritation swirls in my heart.孤独な道 胸の奥に渦巻く焦燥感God of destruction, wake up from your slumber. Repaint this world.破壊の神よ 眠りから覚めこの世界を 塗り替えろDestroy all the distorted logic. Let new buds bloom.歪んだ理屈 壊し尽くして新しい芽を 咲かせようGod of destruction, grab it with your hands. The light of hope, the path to the future.破壊の神よ その手で掴め希望の光を 未来への道をEmbrace all the pain and sorrow. Find the strength to be reborn.痛みと悲しみ 全て抱きしめて生まれ変わる 強さをMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataIllust : ALEKEY
